package.name: com.collab.cabin
package.shortDescription: This section describes the Cabin packages.
package.description: This section describes the Cabin packages.

package.name: com.collab.cabin.containers
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.cabin.containers package contains the container classes.
package.description: The com.collab.cabin.containers package contains the container classes.

package.name: com.collab.cabin.containers.panels
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.cabin.containers.panels package contains the panel classes.
package.description: The com.collab.cabin.containers.panels package contains the panel classes.

package.name: com.collab.cabin.containers.scrollpane
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.cabin.containers.scrollpane package contains the scrollpane classes.
package.description: The com.collab.cabin.containers.scrollpane package contains the scrollpane classes.

package.name: com.collab.cabin.controls
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.cabin.controls package contains the Cabin user-interface controls.
package.description: The com.collab.cabin.controls package contains the Cabin user-interface controls.

package.name: com.collab.cabin.controls.buttons
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.cabin.controls.buttons package contains the classes used by the button-based controls.
package.description: The com.collab.cabin.controls.buttons package contains the classes used by the button-based controls.

package.name: com.collab.cabin.controls.menu
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.cabin.controls.menu package contains the classes used by the menu-based controls.
package.description: The com.collab.cabin.controls.menu package contains the classes used by the menu-based controls.

package.name: com.collab.cabin.core
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.cabin.core package contains the core classes that the Cabin framework uses to build visual displays.
package.description: The com.collab.cabin.core package contains the core classes that the Cabin framework uses to build visual displays.

package.name: com.collab.cabin.display
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.cabin.display package contains display classes.
package.description: The com.collab.cabin.display package contains display classes.

package.name: com.collab.cabin.display.util
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.cabin.display.util package contains the display utility classes.
package.description: The com.collab.cabin.display.util package contains the display utility classes.

package.name: com.collab.cabin.events
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.cabin.events package contains the classes that define Cabin event objects.
package.description: The com.collab.cabin.events package contains the classes that define Cabin event objects.

package.name: com.collab.cabin.graphics
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.cabin.graphics package contains (animated) graphic classes.
package.description: The com.collab.cabin.graphics package contains (animated) graphic classes.

package.name: com.collab.cabin.log
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.cabin.log package contains the logging classes.
package.description: The com.collab.cabin.log package contains the logging classes.

package.name: com.collab.cabin.util
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.cabin.util package contains various helper classes.
package.description: The com.collab.cabin.util package contains various helper classes.
